Text:
I don't understand why so many seem to hold a grudge against Alphasim.
Nevertheless, good upload!
perhaps why they cost very and they are worth little?

Sure, the prices are a bit heavy - and some of Alphasim's birds are pure crap - but the aircrafts released the latest year have proven to be quite astonishing. Just think of addons like the F-22 and the Flanker pack, and I think you will get my point.
True, Massmordaren, but unfortunately has always the virtual cockpit nearly false, a lot little clicked..

That is really a shame - Alphasim sure got the potential to create beautiful models.

By the way, I just tested the aircraft - and I couldn't agree more; it's crap.
*Especially* the VC.
Eh eh I had said it... :)
Well AlphaSim does make a couple of decent aircraft but 3-4 out of almost 100 doesnt make the company any better than crapola :)

Alpha Sim made the best planes ever seen.It's a pleasure to buy them and use....
I hope the y will produce more of these beauties....I can't wait!!!
REQ's - Alphasim F-111 Aardvark & B-1B Lancer & Handley-Page Victor
Does anybody got the Alphasim TU-16
HI@ALL ... plz can someone SEED that thing - its allways stuck at 50 % ... muchos grazias !
